title: Asian beef noodle soup
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon oil, or as needed', '175g steak, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 onion, chopped', '1L beef stock', '3 tablespoons brown sugar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon sriracha hot chilli sauce, or more to taste', '225g rice noodles, broken into pieces', '125g diced carrots', '75g sliced cabbage', '1/2 green pepper, sliced', '1/2 red pepper, sliced', '60g diced celery']
